1.content:
This all had started as just a way to... get away from it all. Unfortunately, you'd never thought you'd be THIS far away...

Let's back up a bit. After pulling the 3rd double shift in a row at your work you were finally due a day off. Sick of everyone at your job and not really knowing many other people yet, you looked up places to hang out around your area. That's when you found it.

It had been forever since you had been at a Renaissance Fair, and although it didn't hold the same spark for you that it used to, you decided it might be fun to give it a try. Unfortunately, although there were plenty other "normal" people at the fair just wanting to soak in the atmosphere, you had forgotten the biggest reason you hadn't come to one of these in forever: the LARPers... It had started out fine, a "knight" in tinfoil armor here, a thief with a set of foam daggers there, but then you ran into "The Grand Wizard, Merlin".

"Merlin" was an overweight kid with glasses in a bathrobe that could barely contain him and a top-hat more reminiscent of Abraham Lincoln than any wizard. Of course, when you pointed this out, Merlin didn't take it so well... You of course had just laughed at the "curses" he proceeded to sling at you (using a chopstick for a wand, no less). You were laughing so hard, that you nearly missed the tingling sensation slowly washing over you. Soon, you weren't laughing anymore as pain racked your body, and it almost felt like you were being... crushed. You closed your eyes and crumpled to the ground, the pain increasing to the point of unbearable levels, until...

As suddenly as the pain had washed over you, it was suddenly gone. You could only lay on the ground with your head spinning, wondering what the hell had just happened. Little did you know, not only were you no longer at the fair, you had been "magically" transported to the Middle Ages... And on top of that, you were only a few inches tall! But if you didn't know that yet, you were about to find out...

Choice 1: You are on the floor of a horrendously messy room, about to be found by a maid who puts up with everyone else's mess, and is about to find someone who'll put up with all of HER messes (you)!

Choice 2: You're in a pouch, about to be given as homage to a Princess who has a disgusting side no one will ever know (except you, that is).

Choice 3: You wake up in the aftermath of a recent explosion, about to be found by an alchemist who thinks she somehow made you.

Choice 4: You're in an empty beer mug, about to be found by a bar wench that wouldn't mind having a "little man" all to herself.

Choice 5: More Choices to be made in the future.
1.title: You Should Never Anger a LARPer...

choices: Try and get her attention! (But you'll regret it!)
Be silent and hope she doesn't see you! (And become a cushion for her butt)
11.content:
You wake up on a floor, covered in trash, food scraps, and other...items. To be honest, it was pretty disgusting, but you couldn't notice since your still dazed. What you DO notice, however, is the 200 lb lady coming into the room.

"I can't believe this! I'm cleaning all day, almost every day, and I'm refused a pay raise?!?" The woman yelled angrily, which, at your current size was deafing. "Wait...current size?" You think, looking around the room, and you see giant tables, and other giant objects. Unless this was a giant's house, clearly that "wizard" shrunk you!

"I guess it can't be helped, might as well start cleaning." You've figured out that this woman is a maid, as she's wearing rags that seem small on her...too small, as you can see some of her buttcheeks, and it doesn't smell pleasant. This maid does indeed start to clean...in the spot you are!!! Should you get her attention?

Choice 1: Yes! Get her attention, she could help you get out of here...or will she? (She won't.)

Choice 2: No! Don't get the attention of this lady! (She ends up sitting on you)
11.title: Maid Desiree Path

111.content:
Upon the approach of this titan you begin to jump up and down. Waving and shouting you hope that she will be able to spot your tiny self. "Help! Help! Down here!", you yell, but freeze when the giant maid's eyes lock onto you. As her hand reaches down to your position you realise that this may be a bad idea.

Her hand covers your body and lifts you to her face. She had a beautiful face, but upon closer inspection you could see that she was drenched in sweat.

"Why hello there little fellow", her voice boomed. You notice her double chin wobble and jiggle as she spoke and the wind generated from her breathe washed over you. Once again you realise her poor hygiene as her breathe stinks. You reply, introducing your self but your voice was drowned out by her continued speech.

"I wonder where you came from, better put you in a safe place. At least until I am on a break" Your world then shifts, giving you a tour of her rotund body as she places you in her safe place.

As it would have it this "safe place turns out to be her.......
111.title: Try and get her attention! (But you'll regr...

choices: She trips and you are propelled out.
1111.content:
Compared to here lower half the maid’s cleavage was significantly smaller. At your normal size her breasts would have been a meaty handful. Now her they are hills of jiggly flesh, pressed together by a tight undergarment.

She pushes you into the fleshy valley. A tight squeeze but thanks to her sweat you slipped in without a a problem. You are facing forward, unable to move (despite your best efforts).

The maid shifted left, then right. Almost as if she was looking for someone. Then she hurried away, less of a run, faster than a walk. More like a bustling shuffle, causing her body to shimmy and shake with her movement.

The slight shifts in her body reverberated to your position. The hill of warm flesh slapped you left and right. Warm sweat splashing over you drenching you further. Each slap left and right loosened the grip her cleavage had on you. Slowly they pushes you down, enveloping your entire body.
1111.title: cleavage

11113.content: You feel her moving to another area to clean, but then she trips. You are propelled out of her cleavage. But where do you land?
11113.title: She trips and you are propelled out.

1112.content:
She sticks you in the little bit of underwear she has and pushes you in her ass deep with her finger. The first thing you notice is the terrible smell, but as you get pushed in deeper you start to feel something sticky and slimy...is that...shit?

"Sorry about the crap." Desiree apologized in a tone that seemed both sarcastic and sincere at the same time. "I'm so busy cleaning this place I never have time to clean myself."

As if to punctuate her sentence, a large fart erupts from her anus, almost blowing you away do to your close range. The terrible smell from her ass intensifies, but you can't run. Her ass is clenched tight, you couldn't move if you tried. "Oh, I'm gassy too." The maid added.

You feel yourself bobbing left and right, apparently she was moving. You were just hoping she's sincerly trying to help you. Maybe when this is all said and done she'd find a better place for you than her terrible ass.

Choice 1: She's sincerely trying to help you, for now at least. Too bad her ass doesn't have the same concern. Prepare for so "unfresh" air.

Choice 2: She's taking out her anger from earlier on you, and your tiny size makes it easy to torture you. Unfortunately for you, she has to clean the bathroom next, and the toilet is filthy. Not to mention she has to go.

Choice 3: She hates you for whatever reason, maybe she's mad, maybe you remind her of somebody else. Maybe you ARE somebody else! Whatever the reason, there's no telling what she's gonna do to you.
1112.title: Irony! Too bad you don't get the joke.

choices: She takes you out and drops you in a toilet
She takes you out and uses you to scrub a toilet
11122.content: "I hope you will enjoy the ride" she says sarcastically. She starts to walk and you slide further down her crack. The smell is awful. You are in there sliding further and further in her crack for 20 minutes when she finally says, "OK, we're here, hope you'll have a good time.
11122.title: Toilet Time (Sarcastic)

choices: Be willing and be used as a scrub brush
Dug through the waste to the bottom of the toilet to escape
111221.content: She drops you in the filthiest toilet ever filled with stacked up shit everywhere. You face plant and you look up to see a asshole right above you. The hole opens up and solid logs of shit come out you dodge the first log but the second log hits you and you fall to floor of shit. You are buried by her waste and after 10 minutes she finally finishes. She says, "I hope you enjoyed that, now it's time for you to be used as a scrub brush!"
111221.title: She takes you out and drops you in a toilet

112.content:
Your eyes would widen considerably as the humongous maid would waddle into the room, her truly massive assets jiggling ever so slightly because of it. Her buttocks clapping gently beneath the flimsy fabric of cloth which just hung down against her buttcrack, barely able to cover it all.

You'd notice Desiree making her way towards you. Noticing the pile which you stood upon, she'd huff slightly as she'd grab it, and you. As she would toss it to the side. Unfortunately, you were too small for her to notice, and as the trash got thrown into the corner of the couch, you dropped from between her fingers and back onto the cushion.

"Oh god, it's been a looong day." She'd say as you'd look up towards her, most of your vision blocked by the oversized buttocks with jiggled above, clapping gently as if her butt was trying to eat the back of her torn skirt. She would arch her back, slowly lowering her massive form onto the seat, which caused her buttcheeks to spread slightly, as the tiny cloth which covered her rear earlier, now disapeared into her buttcrack.
You'd panic, your eyes darting in every way as you tried to figure out the most effecient way off this cushion. "Oh golly, my belly is acting up again." she'd say in a rather goofy tone as you would hear a loud gurgle bubbling inside her lower intestines. Desiree would let out a small grunt, her butthole flexing ever so slightly as it'd bulge, which was clearly visible through the thin fabric before a loud, nasty fart would explode from her butt, forcefully blowing the back of her skirt out from her buttcrack as you'd get a clear view of her fully exposed butthole.

The stench, is nothing like you ever experienced before, the raw, disgusting scent of trash and rotten food quickly filled the room as she'd let out a loud sigh, shivering slightly as she'd giggle.

You would panic even more than before, flailing your arms as you ran towards the back of the couch, her sweaty, disgusting buttocks comming in hot above. They'd finally plant themselves onto the cushion, barely missing you as her cheeks towered beside you, the cloth dropping down infront of you as your world turned black. Her gellatinous, massive rectum would sink into the couch, causing you to slide against the fabric as you found yourself uncontrollably falling backwards. The mixed scent of sweat and ass quickly invaded your nostrils as you slid down to a stop. Coughing loudly as you tried your hardest not to breathe through your mouth.

"Gosh darn belly virus." She'd say as she'd lightly tap her tummy, a furious growl running through her intestines as droplets of sweat would emerge from her skin, rolling down her body and onto the couch. The sweat which forms on her back would take refuge inside her cavernous buttcrack before dripping onto your face, coating your eyes, making you momentarily blind.

Ten Minute Break.
You couldn't get out of the confined cave you've been forced into, and Desiree didn't seem like she was moving anytime soon, so you just had to endure whatever was about to come.

Flying High.
The growl which was heard inside Desiree wasn't a joke. As she'd grunt and groan hard enough to push out a fart, a fart so strong that it sent you flying, causing you to bump into the backrest of her couch, only to soar through the sky and land in a unknown location.

Duty Calls
A unknown lady would burst through the door and demand Desiree's assistance. Catching her by suprise as she'd flex her buttcheeks enough to firmly grasp around your tiny frame while she followed the unknown person.
112.title: Be silent and hope she doesn't see you! (An...

1122.content:
You hear a rumble from deep in her butt. Deeper then you are. You try to wiggle out, but only seems to make the gurgling worst. You stop and hope that it just blows over.

FFFFFFFFFFFFFFRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTTTT!!!!!!!!!!!

You were launched out of her butt and on impact you black out.
Where are you?
1122.title: Flying High.

choices: She tosses the bags and goes about her day allowing you to escape
She continues to use the bag without ever looking inside
She sees you and decides to make you her personal squire
12.content:
You were in some sort of sack and you couldn't see a single thing. It also didn't help that the bag was being jostled around causing you to sporadically move about it's inside uncontrollably. What had happened you thought one minute you were at talking to some nerd and now you're shrunk in a bag. What the hell had happened? All sorts of different thoughts rushed through your head but they were all quickly silenced when the sack stopped shaking and you heard someone talking.

"Your majesty princess Emilia Rainwidth we have come here to pay you and your mothers kingdom homage inside this sack you shall find a gift truly befitting of your royalness." A man's voice said a the sac was placed onto what you could only assume is the ground. You immediately tried to get out of the bag but found it was tightly strung shut so for the time being all you could do is wait and listen.

"You honour me Lord Fringwale I'm quite sure you can make your self of service to us." A girls voice said as regally as you had ever heard. "Now if you would please there are many more matters I must concern myself with."

"Yes quite right your grace I'll show myself out." Fringwale left along with a few others inside the room.

"Servants if you would." the princess must of gestured them out because after hearing a few more footsteps there seemed to be no one in the room. Except for you and the princess that is. Everything was completely silent until........

BRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP

"God I was holding that in forever." Emilia had just let out a tremendous fart. Even from the confines of the bag it sounded loud enough that she could've done it right next to you. Thankfully though the smell hadn't reached you all the way on the floor but that was about to change.

"That idiot Fringwale why must mother make me accept all these useless gifts from the petty noblemen." She picked up the bag you were in. "Gee I wonder what this is perhaps a broach or some priceless family necklace. More to add to the giant pile I already have. I would even say this bag is more useful then whatever trinket that fool has gotten me. In fact I think I know the perfect use for this."

Your hopes were raised as the top of the bag was finally open but they were quickly plummeted when you saw what was on the outside. The princesses royal rump blocked your entire view and submerged you back into darkness. This would of been bad enough as the after affects of her recent emission were radiating from the giant ass but Emilia made sure to add to this.

PFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPTTTTTTTT

"There now I have my own personal fart bag. Now no one can come in unexpected and wonder who let out that ghastly stench this bag here can hold all of it. Speaking of which." Two more farts in quick succession burst forward into your bag prison. The tainted air had no where else to go but your nose. Things stayed like this for a while the end of this girls flatulence was nowhere in sight it was like she just held it in and would release it all whenever she was alone. Of course this time she happened to be alone with you.

"I don't know what's in this but it is a damn good fart soaker." Suddenly a door was opened and some called out "Your grace?"
Quick as could be the princess through the bag down onto her throne and sat down on it as hard as possible. Whatever you were facing before paled in comparison to this form of torture. Two titan butt cheeks sat down on you hard with the present stench of farts right with them.

"Yes what is it?" the princess asked turning on her regal demeanour as she crushed ever bone in your body just by moving slightly in her seat. Emilia even let out a short SBD right onto you and right when someone was in the room.

"I am afraid to inform you that the royal feast will be postponed." The voice said.

"That's quite all right now if you would." The door closed and the princess relaxed down onto you in her seat before letting out one last fart on your smushed body.
12.title: Meeting the Princess

choices: You Shout to Get Her Attention
You Stay Quiet and Breath Through It
You Stay Quiet and Hold Your Breath
122.content: With another grunt the princess ripped a horribly ripe fart on you, and with the stench you knew that you couldn't hold on anymore. Something had to be done about this and quickly. You considered your options; you could just yell out at her and hope she hears you or you could simply stay quiet and bear with it just a little more hoping that she ran out of gas soon.
122.title: Continues Using The Bag Without Looking Inside

123.content:
The princess shifts around a bit, grinding the smell of her large butt further into your nose and mouth. From under her cheeks, you hear

"Wow, i can barely smell a thing, my farts have always smelled. I need to see whats in this bag." You were still disoriented, as the horrid smells made you dizzy, and her giant ass has crushed you flat, but you still notice the weight lift off of you. You feel a scene of weightlessness as she lifts the bag up, and finally you see light. You see her giant face, but before she sees you, she gets a whiff of the monster she created. Her nose recoils and she waves a hand in front of her face.

"Oh my gosh, i guess thats where the smell went." She peers inside the bag, and you wave franticly to try and get her attention, and she dumps you onto her hand. She hold you up to her face to get a better look. Maybe this wasn't such a good idea, as her face looks extremely...
123.title: She sees you and decides to make you her person...

choices: The princess tortures you some more.
1231.content:
"What in the name of my father do you think you are doing?!?!" Exclaimed the Princess, "Were you planning on spying on me?!"

You open your mouth to reply but instantly gag on the fumes still surrounding you.

"Well I guess you just had another thing coming to you!" Emilia stated, "And NOW I have no choice but to keep you here forever! Can't risk my secret getting out now CAN I?!"

Another knock can be heard at the door, and the princess quickly hides you under her butt, "You may enter!" Calls out Emilia.

The same servant who came last time comes in and says, "I apologize for the constant interruptions, my lady, but it seems the feast will be back on schedule, in approximently 15 minutes."

"Thank you," says Emilia, who decides to release another SBD as she's talking, "You are dismissed for now." And the servant leaves. Directed to you again, she says, "As further punishment for your deeds, you shall not only be my captive for eternity, but you will also suffer the stench of my rear end whenever I desire relief."

Apon hearing this, you're heart sinks, knowing the future that lies ahead of you. What happens next in the story?
1231.title: Getting on the Princess' bad side... Literally...

12313.content:
She open the back top of her dress and drops you in. You slide down her back and see her white panties, races up to you. You slip into them with out a problem. Now you are in the most smelliest place you have ever been. You feel the princess start to walk and you start to slide deeper. After a while you are near her anus. The smell just got a thousand times worse. She felt you when you hit her anus. She lets out a very smelly SBD. You nearly black out. You then see her hole opening real wide, you know what’s coming. A huge fart blasts into your face.

Are you blasted out, or stay in?
12313.title: Readers Choice

1232.content:
The princess grinned into the bag.

"Well this a surprise", she chimed as you stare up at her visage. Her face was quite beautiful, it was slender with no signed of blemishes. She was looking down at you with big emerald eyes. You would be undoubtedly attracted to her if it was not for the tremendous thunder that came out the other end.

"I think you might just be my best gift yet". This made your heart sink, clearly she was not going to help you. You simply stare at her dumbfounded, you are not too sure how to behave in front of royalty. The princess continued to speak regardless.

"You my little man have already been exposed to my little secret" her gin widened, "You see I am expected to be prim and proper 24 hours a day and it gets exhausting"

She shifts cupping you in her hands. "You are going to help me get all of this out of my system, you get to be the only person who gets to know the real me"

"How does that sound?" she winks. "You get to be the personal servant of a princess"

Your head is spinning, this is an awful lot to take in. You figure that you could be in a worse place, you after all in a palace right now. Did she just ask you a question? You aren't sure, should you answer? was it rhetorical? what should you do? You think that making a gesture might be the best option. Plus you might be able to pass it off as something else.

You decide to....
1232.title: Mischievous

choices: You Shout to Her to Get Her Attention
You Stay Quiet and Prepare to Dodge the Turds
You Resign Yourself to Your Fate
124.content:
"Oh my God that last one felt a-MA-zing~…" the princess groaned. Of course, you weren't feeling the same about it and desperately wished that she would just open the bag already so you could get out (and so that if you ever found a way to grow yourself back you'd somehow pay back her and the nerd who shrunk you with interest). Another bout of grunting and the princess let loose another fart into the bag, and this one stunk even worse despite being shorter than the others
         "Oof, now I'm feeling choked up back there… Well, I'm sure whatever's inside soaking up my gas ought to handle these serious sludge bombs I'm about to drop…" Eyes having flown wide open with fear, you panicked knowing that you did not have much time left before shit hit the fan (or you to be precise), and while you could hope that if someone came in then the princess would hold herself back, you knew that it was just that—hope. You could hear the princess straining and with so few precious seconds left you considered your options…
124.title: Writer's Choice

choices: A knock at the door interrupts her
13.content:
Pain ached through your body as you sat up.Whatever that Merlin kid did to you was really effective.You then get to your feet and started looking for that nerd,but to your surprise,all to see for miles was a very smoky fog.With your eyes squinted you looked further into the darkness.The smoke then started to clear up and revealed that staring back at you was a giant woman!You screamed and fell on your bottom again.
"A-a tiny person?!This was not intended to happen...It's not a bad thing,but it shouldn't have happened!"
You could tell the lady looked elated despite half her face being under giant goggles and the other half being covered with ash,as if she was just in an explosion.She then starts poking and prodding you,lifting up your arms,flipping you upside down,and inspecting your clothes.
"Very strange indeed.Maybe I added too much sweat to the potion?"
She continued to move you around like a doll and you were starting to get tired of it.You opened your mouth to protest against her actions but were surprised to find out that you couldn't speak!You try to utter out just a squeak,but to no avail.The lady notices your attempts and prognosticates your situation.
"Don't be worried tiny specimen,I've had the exact same problem before.All my potions have the effect of disconnecting vocal cords due to my brewing pot.All I needed was a potion and I was good to go.Unfortunately I don't have ingredients for another batch yet,but I should have them by tomorrow."
She dropped you on the table and took off her goggles,revealing a beautiful pair of green eyes,with the rest of her face still being covered in soot.Then the lady grabbed her clipboard and scribbled down numbers.She walked into another area of the lab that looked like a bathroom.

While she was gone you scanned the alchemist's house.The room you were in looked like it was from medieval times and seemed to be a combination of her bedroom and lab.In fact,this seemed to be the only room,as there were no stairs or doors other than the one to the bathroom and the exit.Suddenly you hear her voice echo through the other room.
"Oh,how rude of me,I forgot to give you a name!...I suppose I'll just call you tiny,and when you can talk again you will call me Rasilda."
Rasilda then walks out of the bathroom and had apparently cleaned herself up.Without the ash covering up everything you could finally see what she looked like.She was very flat and only upon close examination were you able to make out her assets.The thing that stuck out the most to you though was her messy purple hair.Rasilda soon makes her way over to you and takes you into her sweaty hands and brings you up to her tiny nose
"Although I wasn't expecting you,I have actually really needed an assistant to help me if my experiments goes wrong.Just last week I had gotten terrible diarrhea from a potion and was stuck crouching over my chamber pot for two days just because I had run out of paper." She chuckled and you started to cringe.
"So since I created and now technically own you,I declare you as my assistant,to help me with all my problems no matter what."
You now wish you had tried to escape while she was gone.
"And now is the perfect time to..."
13.title: Novice Alchemist Rasilda Path

131.content:
"Well my little assistant, why put off for tomorrow what you can do today? I was a little hesitant about finishing this next one up, but as long as I have someone like you around, I might as well try it out." Rasilda pulled over a half-filled beaker, as well as some ingredients, before turning back to you. "And in case you were thinking away, remember, you're my creation, so I can do what I want with you. Run away or refuse to help, and I'll dunk you in the very worst potions I know. Believe me, you won't appreciate it."

         She turned back to her potion making as you felt a chill run down your spine. Who the hell was this girl? You briefly considered running away now anyway, especially as your mind flipped back to the scene she had just described - diarrhea for two whole days? And she would want you to fetch TP for her and stick around as she went through that? You couldn't help but imagine the skinny girl squatting over a bucket right in the middle of the floor, with you kept in her breast pocket forced to smell it. Truly a disgusting image. You doubted she could make you go through much worse - until you realized it was a potion of her own creation that did it to her. If she was willing to do that to herself, what horrors could she have planned for you? You quickly made up your mind it was better to be an assistant for this crazy woman than her lab rat, at least until a very promising chance for escape presented herself. Besides, once you can talk again she might even be kind enough to try creating a potion to at least grow you back... Right?

         While this thought process was running through your head, she had diligently been working on her potion. "One thing you'll learn about me, tiny, is that I'm absolutely infatuated with potions. Making them, drinking them, using them to solve problems. You name it, potions are the answer! I'd use you to try them out, but to be honest, you can learn a lot more experiencing the effects first hand. Besides, I probably have a bit more tolerance for the... negative effects." Finally, she turns back to you. "Huh... Where'd you go? Oh, there you are, right where I left you. Maybe you're a better listener than I thought. Hmph, or maybe I created such a perv you've been sitting here for the last few minutes imagining me on the chamber pot after all? Hahaha!" You blushed and looked away, more than a little embarassed that she wasn't all wrong - though she had the reason completely backwards. You'd have to remember to set her straight once you could talk - or maybe that would seem even worse? You definitely didn't want her getting the wrong idea, either way. Before you could get your thoughts in order, she slammed the beaker, now full, down next to you. "Well, tiny? Shall I go bottoms up?"

What color is the potion?
131.title: Test a potion

choices: Have her Drink the Potion (Stay for Help)
Have her Drink the Potion (Run for Help)
Don't Have her Drink the Potion (Try Something Else)
1311.content: It was a beaker filled to its top with a dark, murky brown solution. Right away you had a guess of what it was going to do to her and greatly cringed. Her comments about her bathroom mishaps were still fresh in your mind, and internally you debated on whether or not you should let her drink the solution; on the one hand, letting her drink the solution meant that you were likely to be the unfortunate witness to her horrid output—and on the other hand, letting her drink the solution meant that you had an opportunity to escape from her when she was on the can. However, if you stayed, the alchemist just might be able and willing to help you with your predicament, especially since it seemed dangerous to go alone out in the world in your shrunken and mute state—then again, she might not be able or willing to help you, and perhaps you would be better off seeking out help from elsewhere despite the dangers. Ultimately, the decision of whether or not you could find help in her would decide if you should try to stay or escape if she drank the potion, or if you were going to have her focus on other things.

choices: Have her Drink the Potion (Stay for Help)
Have her Drink the Potion (Run for Help)
Don't Have her Drink the Potion (Try Something Else)

Her comments about her bathroom mishaps were still fresh in your mind, and internally you debated on whether or not you should let her drink the solution; on the one hand, letting her drink the solution meant that you were likely to be the unfortunate witness to whatever effect the potion could have on her—and on the other hand, letting her drink the solution meant that you had an opportunity to escape from her when she was on the can. However, if you stayed, the alchemist just might be able and willing to help you with your predicament, especially since it seemed dangerous to go alone out in the world in your shrunken and mute state—then again, she might not be able or willing to help you, and perhaps you would be better off seeking out help from elsewhere despite the dangers. Ultimately, the decision of whether or not you could find help in her would decide if you should try to stay or escape if she drank the potion, or if you were going to have her focus on other things.

choices: Have her Drink the Potion (Stay for Help)
Have her Drink the Potion (Run for Help)
Don't Have her Drink the Potion (Try Something Else)

info.brief_description: After crossing a "sorcerer" at a renaissance fair, you're shrunk and sent back in time...
info.description:
You decide to go to a renaissance fair to have a bit of fun. Unfortunately some people at the fair are taking their LARPing (Live Action Roleplaying) a bit too seriously, and when you laugh at a "sorcerer", you get a "curse" cast on you. Unfortunately for you, not only does the magic somehow work, but you're both shrunk AND sent back to the Middle Ages! This should be interesting...

Okay, rules...

Focus On- Butt, Toilet (and all things in/around them), Fart, Stink of All Kinds, and General Humiliation
Allowed- Feet, Sweat, Snot, Armpits, and General Gross Stuff
Discouraged (Though Allowed in Small/Appropriate Doses)- Mouth-Play, Vagina-Play, Insertion
Not Allowed (Will Be Deleted)- Male to Male Acts, Vore (Especially Anything Above Soft), Gore, and Death
EVERYONE IS 18+; NO UNDERAGE ALLOWED
Other random tidbits (may add to this as stuff comes up): You're invincible, immortal, and don't lose your shape. If you're wanting to deviate from anything above, feel free to send me a PM, and I'm sure we can work something out; essentially, if it's written well enough, I'm open to more than what I'm usually up for. Apologies in advance for any inaccuracies to do with history. X3
(I reserve the right to edit for grammar/delete posts that don't follow these rules, or are just in general terrible entries/"thread killers".)

I'm wanting this to be a story mostly revolving around girls' bums (and all the nasty things associated with them) from the Middle Ages. You will be noticed by whoever you choose, but for some odd reason (could be due to the "curse", bad luck, etc.) you end up in horrible unaware tortures, only to have the person you're with don't seem to notice they did it to you, don't care enough to do anything about it even if they do, or brush it off as nowhere near as big of a deal as it should be. (I.E., A character is carrying you in her handkerchief to conceal you from others, and suddenly gets the urge to blow her nose, blowing it all over you without thinking and rubbing it all in, never noticing you're now covered in her snot once she takes you out.) Of course deviations from this are acceptable, but try to keep with the main theme as much as possible if you add. Most of all, have fun!
